value.title: How to troubleshoot the most common issues on Azure resources | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, you will learn how to troubleshoot the most common issues on Azure resources using the new Diagnose and Solve Problems feature.   Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com     Keep connected on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzurePortal

value.title: What types of Azure RBAC role definitions exist? | One Dev Question: Arturo Lucatero
value.excerpt: In the One Dev Question series, Arturo Lucatero, a Senior Program Manager working on Azure role-based access control (RBAC), explains the various types of Azure role-based access control definitions.    For more information, visit: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview

value.title: Azure for the Data Engineer
value.excerpt: This learning path guides data engineers through the evolving benefits your organization gains with Azure cloud data platform technologies.

topItems.title: Understand the evolving world of data
topItems.excerpt: Discover how data systems and roles are evolving and explore the differences between on-premises and cloud data solutions using sample business cases.

topItems.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform
topItems.excerpt: Explore the broad array of Azure technologies that analyze text or images and relational, nonrelational, or streaming data.

topItems.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the responsibilities of a data engineer, how they relate to the jobs of other data and AI roles, and explore common data engineering practices.

value.title: Describe the capabilities of Microsoft compliance solutions
value.excerpt: Describe the capabilities of Microsoft compliance solutions

topItems.title: Describe the compliance management capabilities in Microsoft
topItems.excerpt: Describe the compliance management capabilities in Microsoft

topItems.title: Describe resource governance capabilities in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Describe resource governance capabilities in Azure

value.title: Evaluate text with Azure Cognitive Language Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Cognitive Language Services to analyze text, determine intent, detect adult themes, and process natural language input

topItems.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

topItems.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

topItems.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: SC-900 part 4: Describe the capabilities of Microsoft compliance solutions
value.excerpt: SC-900 part 4: Describe the capabilities of Microsoft compliance solutions

topItems.title: Describe resource governance capabilities in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Describe resource governance capabilities in Azure

value.title: Deploy a containerized application on Azure Kubernetes Service
value.excerpt: Explore how to create and deploy a containerized application by using Azure Kubernetes Service declarative manifest files.

value.title: Allow users to reset their password with Azure Active Directory self-service password reset
value.excerpt: Learn how to allow users to reset their password with Azure Active Directory self-service password reset.

value.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs
value.excerpt: Use Azure Monitor logs to extract valuable information about your infrastructure from log data.

value.title: Create a long-running serverless workflow with Durable Functions
value.excerpt: Learn how to orchestrate a long-running workflow as a set of activities using scalable and cost-effective Durable Functions.

value.title: Deploy and configure servers, instances, and databases for Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Deploy and configure servers, instances, and databases for Azure SQL

value.title: Introduction to Azure SQL
value.excerpt: This module introduces Azure SQL. Learn about various deployment options and service tiers and what to use for your organization.

value.title: Expose multiple Azure Function apps as a consistent API by using Azure API Management
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to assemble multiple Azure Functions into a single API using Azure API Management.

value.title: Chain Azure Functions together using input and output bindings
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll learn how to integrate your Azure Function with various data sources by using bindings.

value.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

value.title: Understand virtualization
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Take a deep dive into virtualization by understanding its formal definition as well as the different types of virtual machines.

value.title: Configure and manage secrets in Azure Key Vault
value.excerpt: Configure and manage secrets in Azure Key Vault

value.title: Connect your on-premises network to the Microsoft global network by using ExpressRoute
value.excerpt: Connect your on-premises systems and users to Azure and Office 365 by using ExpressRoute for private, dedicated, and guaranteed throughput connectivity.

value.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

value.title: Create custom roles for Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
value.excerpt: Learn how to create custom roles for Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC).

value.title: Deploy SAP certified offerings on Azure
value.excerpt: Azure provides a scalable, compliant, and enterprise-proven platform for a range of SAP workloads. In this module, you explore the platform compliance criteria that is stipulated by SAP before deploying SAP solutions in Azure, and look at the different options for deploying SAP in Azure.

value.title: Deploy Azure virtual machines from VHD templates
value.excerpt: Standardize and automate your virtual machine deployments to minimize manual configuration, variance, and error.

value.title: Describe the compliance management capabilities in Microsoft
value.excerpt: Describe the compliance management capabilities in Microsoft

value.title: Detect language with the text analytics API
value.excerpt: Language detection is useful for content stores that collect arbitrary text, where language is unknown. You can parse the results of this analysis to determine which language is used in the input document.

value.title: Develop, test, and deploy an Azure Function with Visual Studio
value.excerpt: Use Visual Studio together with a test framework to create, deploy, and test an Azure Function.

value.title: Enhance your service availability and data locality by using Azure Traffic Manager
value.excerpt: Discover how Azure Traffic Manager provides DNS load balancing for your application to improve the performance and availability of your application.

value.title: Understand the evolving world of data
value.excerpt: Discover how data systems and roles are evolving and explore the differences between on-premises and cloud data solutions using sample business cases.
